devdoc.author: Rodrigo Herrera I.

exec(address,uint256,bytes,uint256,uint2.details: Executes a generic transaction. It does not support 'delegatecall' for security reasons.

execFromModule(address,uint256,bytes,uin.details: Allows to execute a transaction from an authorized module.

init(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,add.details: Setup function, sets initial storage of the wallet.

returns._0: Magic value  or reverts with an error message.

lock().details: Locks the wallet. Once locked, only the SSR module can unlock it or recover it.

unlock().details: Unlocks the wallet. Can only be unlocked or recovered from the SSR module.

devdoc.title: LaserWallet - Modular EVM based smart contract wallet.

exec(address,uint256,bytes,uint256,uint2.notice: If 'gasLimit' does not match the actual gas limit of the transaction, the relayer can incur losses. It is the relayer's responsability to make sure that they are the same, the user does not get affected if a mistake is made. We prefer to prioritize the user's safety (not overpay) over the relayer.

init(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,add.notice: It can't be called after initialization.
